OOC: Damn it! Who controls the base? Cause whoever does, reply to my attack=
s! I'm tired of being ignored! And yet everything seems to go on very casua=
lly. Why? Cause I'm not popular like Airly? And Airly, it is McGowan's team=
! Not Barrymore! And it's Barrymore with an I...

IC:

Periwinkle stops str=
uggling and stares into space after the cerebro shell was inserted in her h=
ead. She was now Bombshell's slave...

McGowan swiftly dodges the autoguns =
shots. Virgo, Birdbot and Papertron are struck by the several shots but hol=
d their ground. On the other hand, Barrymore, Lee and Depp dodged the shots=
. Barrymore with a sidejump, Lee with and duck & roll and Depp with a high =
jump. She remembered that although Pink was dead, they still had Brown.

Mc=
Gowan: I hope you Shitrons know that there is going to be another death ove=
r here! Your precious little Shitron is about to suffer!

Depp passes Brown=
 to McGowan. McGowan first watches Virgo fire off 8 shots, Barrymore fire o=
ff 6 shots, Lee fire off 2 fireballs, Depp fire off 4 plasma shots, Birdbot=
 fire 2 more grenades and Papertron fire off 10 shots. McGowan smiled, watc=
hing all of the shots go sailing towards the Chivtron base. McGowan turns t=
o the Insecticons.

McGowan: Hey, if someone doesn't come out soon, would y=
ou mind eating this guy?

Brown eyes widened and hoped that the Insecticons=
 would do something less brutal...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From:=
 Airshadow Nightlight 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, Febr=
uary 16, 2002 1:50 AM
  Subject: Re: Insecticons. Can you dig it, Chivtrons=
?...


  OOC: Regarding Rudra's ooc's post I'll post with Aerotaur. 

  Win=
dlord/Aerotaur/Nightlight::: 

  "Stop little one!!" said Aerotaur while he=
 took at Trinity and left her in Nightlight's arms. 

  "But I wanna help, =
uncle Aerotaur"said Trinity. 

  "No yet"replied Aerotaur  who turned on th=
e base's defences. 

  The external defences turned on and fired against th=
e Insecticons and Barrimore's team.
